description: A React functional component implementing a sidebar interface for a note-taking application. It allows users to view, add, import, and delete notes within a project, with styling and event handling for file input and note selection.

methods.name: onImportClick
methods.description: Triggers a click event on the hidden file input element to open file selection dialog.

methods.name: onFileChange
methods.description: Handles the change event for the file input; reads the selected file, parses notes, and imports them into the app state.
